FileSystemList_getWorkingDirectory.name: FileSystemList_getWorkingDirectory
FileSystemList_getWorkingDirectory.returns: The full path of the working directory on the filesystem

FileSystemList_setWorkingDirectory.name: FileSystemList_setWorkingDirectory
FileSystemList_setWorkingDirectory.description:
Set the working directory. The dir argument may be an absolute filesystem path, otherwise relative to the current working directory.
If the dir starts with / it will first be checked as an absolute directory, then as relative path to the working directory.

FileSystemList_searchFilesMatchingConten.name: FileSystemList_searchFilesMatchingContents
FileSystemList_searchFilesMatchingConten.description: Searches for files on the filesystem (using ripgrep) with contents matching the search regex.

parameters.name: contentsRegex
parameters.description: The regular expression to search the content all the files recursively for

contentsRegex.description: The regular expression to search the content all the files recursively for

FileSystemList_searchFilesMatchingConten.returns: The list of filenames (with postfix :<match_count>) which have contents matching the regular expression.

FileSystemList_searchFilesMatchingName.name: FileSystemList_searchFilesMatchingName
FileSystemList_searchFilesMatchingName.description: Searches for files on the filesystem where the filename matches the regex.

parameters.name: fileNameRegex
parameters.description: The regular expression to match the filename.

fileNameRegex.description: The regular expression to match the filename.

FileSystemList_searchFilesMatchingName.returns: The list of filenames matching the regular expression.

FileSystemList_listFilesInDirectory.name: FileSystemList_listFilesInDirectory
FileSystemList_listFilesInDirectory.description:
Lists the file and folder names in a single directory.
Folder names will end with a /

parameters.name: dirPath
parameters.description: The folder to list the files in. Defaults to the working directory

dirPath.description: The folder to list the files in. Defaults to the working directory

FileSystemList_listFilesInDirectory.returns: The list of file and folder names

FileSystemList_listFilesRecursively.name: FileSystemList_listFilesRecursively
FileSystemList_listFilesRecursively.description: List all the files recursively under the given path, excluding any paths in a .gitignore file if it exists
FileSystemList_listFilesRecursively.returns: The list of files relative to the working directory

FileSystemList_fileExists.name: FileSystemList_fileExists
FileSystemList_fileExists.description: Check if a file exists. A filePath starts with / is it relative to FileSystem.basePath, otherwise its relative to FileSystem.workingDirectory
FileSystemList_fileExists.returns: True if the file exists, else false
